name: com.ireshsampath.unity-assets-easy-osc
description: EasyOSC provides a comprehensive solution for handling Open Sound Control (OSC) messages in Unity, built on top of extOSC. It supports efficient OSC sending and receiving, ideal for real-time apps, interactive installations, and networked multimedia projects.

samples.description: An example scene demonstrating OSC message handling in Unity using extOSC.
